website_summaries.verdict: An audio splitter that is easy to connect to MP3 players, smartphones, tablets, and other devices.
pros: Features metal housing that is both strong and versatile
Equipped with gold-plated connector terminals that limit the risk of corrosion
Boasts bare copper connectors that ensure long-lasting performance
Offers string relief rings near the connectors to increase flexibility and stability
cons: Sometimes generates white noise during use
Less durable than many comparable splitters

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times on a plane. When I travel with someone and we want to watch a video on a phone or laptop this is a great device to have, so we can each wear a full set of headphones and hear the device. For fancier headphones that also have controls, they won't work with this (you will need to control play/pause, volume, etc. on the device itself). The quality of the sound seemed fine to me, but then again I'm not picky. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MTeg

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Quality control seems to be an issue.. This one I got looks like it was ran over by a truck or something. I don't want to use it and have it damage my 3.5mm socket.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Replacement worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Sound only comes out of one side on each ear bud. I'll be returning this. UPDATE: After leaving my original review, the company very kindly contacted me and asked if they can send me a new item for an updated review. I agreed, and the new one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Just Works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this splitter to send audio from an Amazon Echo Dot 'and' a PC to the same set of powered speakers. It works great with the PC plugged into one of the female connectors, powered speakers into another female connector and the male connector into the Dot. I did use ainline volume control to attenuate the volume a bit. Even at its lowest volume level Alexa's voice/music were too loud for my small office. The volume control fixed that and now I can run the Dot at level 5 volume comfortably with room left on either side for softer or louder if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetjq

customer_reviews.title: Great Y Splitter at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how many BAD reviews there are for something as simply as a headphone splitter! But I have to say this one from Ugreen works! It was shipped immediately, and arrived on a SUNDAY with Amazon Prime FREE 2-day shipping. You just can't beat that. Some of the other products simply split the audio so that one side got all of one channel and the other side got all of the other channel. NOT the case with the Ugreen splitter! It is perfect stereo in BOTH jacks! I wholeheartedly recommend this device. At the low price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: GuyLumbago

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so my boyfriend and I would not have to share headphones on a long plane ride overseas in case we wanted to watch a movie. These allowed us to watch the same movie on one device resulting in taking less electronics with us on our trip. They are super easy to use and the sound quality was great! They definitely did what I needed them to do! I definitely recommend these, especially if your traveling with someone!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Better sound, as well as enough length and flexibility to prevent disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: This allows my spouse and I to listen to music together on the same device. I notice that the sound is better than our last splitter, and this one doesn't make the volume go lower when two headphones are in versus when one is connected. Beyond sounding great, there's enough length and flexibility to this that it doesn't matter how oddly one of our headphone cords might get angled, it handles it. A great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: eM/P

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to use this for my wife and I to each plug our ear buds into our laptop for streaming while our newborn sleeps. You only get sound in one ear and our earbud plugs (which work in everything else we plug them into) don'y stay in. Can't imagine what these would be good for. If anyone has a suggestion for an alternative product that will work, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Patrick Wane

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Perfect for couples to share on a flight
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Bought this for a 12 hour flight to Hawaii so we could both watch movies on the ipad. Both sets of headphones were loud and clear. No crackling or going in and out. Cord is also long enough to stretch between two airplane seats. Made our flight so much better!
customer_reviews.author: K.Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL GARBAGE. GENERATES LOUD WHITE NOISE.
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival I noticed it generating static into both of the outputs. I was able to mess around with it and get it to stop. I recently moved apartments and so I had to move my speakers. Tried messing with the orientation of this and nothing stops it from generating noise. Without this, both speakers are crystal clear. Plug the speakers into this, without an input and the white noise is INSANE. Plug this into an input, and the white noise gets quieter but is still present.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: broke my speakers?
customer_reviews.text: speakers and subwoofer connected to my pc were working completely fine and as soon as i plugged this adapter into the speaker to split sound coming from my xbox and pc (so i didnt have to keep switching the aux cord around) there was unimaginable squeaking and feedback coming from my speakers and there was no way to fix it even with the adapter unplugged and setting it back up the exact same way it was before.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the pruchase!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this audio splitter so that my girlfriend and I can watch movies on my Fire HD 10. The build of the product is sturdy, as is the quality of the product. I like that the ends hold extremely well with the headphones! Overall a great product, I know there are cheaper options, but I was willing to pay a little more for something that's more of a safe bet and am glad that I did. I would buy again if I needed another set and recommend this to anyone looking for an affordable audio splitter that's reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, horrible execution of a simple thing. 0/10
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money or the time it takes for delivery. It does not work as intended. It does not 'clip' in the headphones and lets them fall out with any motion. If any shifting occurs it will send horrific feedback through the headphones, and sometimes have one or both of the receiving headphone jacks go dark. It should not be possible to screw up such a simple thing.
customer_reviews.author: smant

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality plus a nice, Unexpected Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Love these earbuds! They're great. They are as well-packaged as a new iPhone. They sound wonderful and are well worth the money. They even include a nice carrying pouch to protect them, which I was not expecting. That was a nice surprise. And here's the significance of the carrying pouch: I bought these for my husband and in order to have them handy when he might need them, he has to put them in one of his pockets. Without that pouch, they would obviously get tangled and eventually break. So, the pouch (as insignificant as it might sound), is a really beneficial feature. I'm thinking of who I might buy these for, for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper - Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get right channel to work.
customer_reviews.text: This splitter appears to be well-made and attractive. However, with the first headset I tried, if I did not insert the headset plug all the way into the jack and hold it there, I would lose the right channel. This was the case for both output jacks, so I don't think this is a defective unit. I tried with three different headsets, one would not give me the right channel unless I held it in place, one worked fine, and one was in-between, where a very slight tug (i.e., letting gravity pull on the cord) would be enough to cause the right channel to go away. This is way too fussy for me. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Halpern

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a splitter that allowed for two female outputs jacks that were not close to each other so that the large base of the two different sized male connector bases could be placed in the female connectors without crowding the other jack. A single unit splitter (where the output jacks are in a molded case with the female jacks spaced close together) wouldn't allow two larger-based male jacks to be placed in the splitter side-by-side. This splitter allowed the connection space that I needed. Excellent quality and a pleasing look (because the connector would be exposed) I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: storyman53

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Gem!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an internet radio DJ and needed to split for a guest on the show. She heard perfectly with this Y splitter cable. No static, noise or other interference. Did not come apart or loosen. Cable length is long enough to not have to sit so close to the other listener. Streamline design exactly as shown in picture. I would highly recommend. Does anyone know if this brand sells a splitter than can handle more than 2 listeners?
customer_reviews.author: T. London

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my Dad will be able to watch movies with me on the Ipad while we are traveling for an upcoming trip. Tested it out by plugging into my iphone and plugged my Sony noise cancellation headphones in one port while I plugged my Apple headphones in the other port. Tested out both headphones and the sound quality was great, not at all compromised due to the splitter. The wire is good quality, not some cheap material. Will update if I run into any issues while on the trip otherwise in the initial tests, it performed really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaspreet Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Virutec Computer Repair Approved.
customer_reviews.text: I run a small computer repair store and only leave reviews on the things I feel meet expectations. I am giving this item a 5 star because It works great with no problems. We probably spend over $50,000 a year on Amazon for our business, so finding the right parts in a timely matter at an affordable price so I can make some profit is key. We rely on Amazon to keep us in stock with parts.
customer_reviews.author: Virutec Computer Repair

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Even Last a Month
customer_reviews.text: I used this to split my speakers and headphones from my PC. No stress was ever placed on the cable or connectors - it was just laying still behind my PC. It worked great at first, but after a few weeks I noticed I wasn't really hearing anything out of the right side of my speakers anymore. I didn't check my headphones for another week. That's when I realized the cause - 2 weeks after the deadline for returns.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome read review
customer_reviews.text: Glad I finally found it! On a flight a while back the guy next to me was jamming out on his phone. Then asked if I would like to plug in with him? I was wondering how when I'd never seen a phone with two jacks. Out of his pocket he pulls out this two way jack and the rest is history. He let me keep it at the end of the trip. On the flight back I shared with the lady next to me. Did the same and passed them on. Well now I have my own that might be passed on, only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Elroy Portis III

customer_reviews.title: Changing my opinion as an average product
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this to split audio between headphone and stand alone speakers for my computer. After couple of weeks of using, I notices that the output to stand alone speaker went bad to such and extend that I had to increase my volume level very high to hear anything clear. Removed the splitter and connected the speaker back to computer and now I am getting the same old loud and clear volume. Something is going wrong with splitter. When I started using it, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shibu kunneth

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work. :-(
customer_reviews.text: Worked great!..... one time. The very next time we tried to use them, it was just horrible crackling, cutting in and out of the sound.... and also the sound didn’t link to the video, there was a very annoying 2-3 second delay. Frustrating... I do wanted these to work
customer_reviews.author: 1review

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Splitter only re-routed single channels (only L or R, NOT both) to either headset. This was tested using different sources (iPad, Nook, IPhone, PC, etc.) and different headsets, yet the same result was applicable. It's unfortunate, as I wanted to use this to replace my existing splitter because of the added length. Waste of a purchase and will be returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Sharing what you are listening to made easy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see that my high school age gaming nephew did not use Bluetooth headphones. His mom explained that headphones were very easy to leave, damage and or lose, thus the most inexpensive 3.5mm jack earphones is what she bought and had on hand to replace. Now I had the need for the splitter, so when he wanted me to hear his newest fav song I could connect my set and be cool Aunt Jenny. I took a cue from mom, I keep the splitter in my kit and pull it out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Says Squat

customer_reviews.title: Unstable Connection
customer_reviews.text: I have trusted the brand for the longest time although this product isn't one of the best. One of the problems in this one is that the female connector doesn't lock with the male end. It is so fragile/a bit loose where there's tendency to lose connection, or sometimes turn the audio to mono (either L or R only has output). It's kinda a hassle returning it so the workaround solution here only is to "move" the cable to ensure proper connection
customer_reviews.author: John Oliveros

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedtime.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. My wife and I would share a head phone set while in bed watching our Roku. It got a little annoying when she would always move and yank the ear bud out of my ear. Then it’s dark and fumbling around to find it but hey that could lead to other fun activities. Anyway this helped us relax more while in bed since we now both are able to have a set of headphones. Did not notice a quality drop while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased so I could have a pair of headphones plugged in to both of my children's computers alongside them for virtual learning. The splitter adds about 12" of length to the headphones, so I can have my earbuds next to me while I work, but pop them in quickly in case I need to hear something the teacher says. The sound quality is good and the price is appropriate. I recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, doesn't stay put
customer_reviews.text: I guess, in case of such simple item, it's either 5-stars of no-stars. What's wrong with this thing? Well, it's 1) not staying clicked in 2) even if it does, it may transmit only one of the channels. Minor moving about will fix that, but why does it need to be so difficult? Overall, as stated, it works sometimes, but not always and therefore it's 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Middlesex

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter
customer_reviews.text: I have high hopes for this splitter (I actually purchased two). So far they work just great. The sound seems to be normal, and the connectors fit well into my iPhones, computers, and other devices that I have. I purchased three splitters at BestBut. All failed. This splitter is better built than the ones I purchased at BB. All the splitters I've seen have been made in Taiwan or China, so prolly not gunna be the best in the world, but this splitter is decent, and it's a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This cable Stopped working after about 6 months, just sitting there with my two sets of speakers plugged in... all of a sudden, the sound would drop out, touching or tapping the wire got sound working again but after about 20 minutes , the sounds dropped out again. Both sets of speakers work when plugged in directly but.. using this splitter, the sound drops out.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade25

customer_reviews.title: Nice Audio Splitter
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice splitter. Good fit regarding the plug and two jacks. Sound through splitter seems good. Overall length (one end to another) is approx 11 inches, and length of actual cable portion is approx 8.5 inches. Four stars (vs five) only because I usually prefer a thicker cable (at least a thicker covering on the cable), but just that's my preference.
customer_reviews.author: T M PRINCE

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Sound would cut out and be super fuzzy, we'd be lucky if we heard 2 seconds of anything clear and crisp. EDIT: Within 24 hours of leaving my above 1 star review the company reached out to me apologizing for the poor performance, and sent me a new one free of charge. After testing this one, I believe that the original I ordered must have been faulty as I had zero issues with the new one. Sound was clear and crisp, just as I would expect it to be, and the customer service is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value splitting solution- clean sound, no static
customer_reviews.text: Works great- no static just clean sound.. I was a little suspect given the really small gauge of the wire but the connectors and wire carry nice clear sound. I have had great success with other UGREEN cables and this one is no exception. My primary use for this splitter is to link two ION Block Rocker Max Bluetooth Speakers and it works great. It gives me portable stereo sound that packs a punch.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Quality - works great
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old splitter. My headphones used to have all this static from the PC. I thru the old splitter away, plugged this in. The speakers were clearer and louder and my headphones were clear! You ever buy something and think, "Good Lord why didn't I buy this years ago?" This is that purchase for me. Thank you UGREEN.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great for splitting speakers and headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my media computer that has sound channels on 1/8th inch stereo audio out and HDMI. The monitor I use has no speakers so I have external tabletop speakers for sound. I can turn those on/off, so when I want headphones all I have to do is plug them into the "spare" tap now. In fact, the computer drives both just fine, but I really only use one or the other. Quality product, well made, wire length is perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: unhappy2

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this to use with headphones and a Yamaha keyboard. You can plug 2 headphones in to the adapter. Great for creative people that may have to keep the volume down at home (but of course all ways be aware of your surroundings). Have 1 IPAD and pick up an extra hyper kid....no problem, plug in your UGREEN adapter, two headphones , set the volume low for little ears, find that exciting educational video and go. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent with old stereo receiver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great splitter. I plug it in the front of my stereo receiver with an adapter plug. From there I have two sets of earbuds plugged in to the ports of the splitter. I have another Egreen adapter cord that goes from the tv to the back of the stereo to allow TV sound on the old receiver. The sound is excellent. Works great for my old receiver, 2016 smart TV and cell phone ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kerwell

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, secure connection, and consistent output between terminals
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three or four splitters in the past and they all had some fatal flaw. This, however, is great. Admirable build quality and you get a real satisfying and secure click when plugging in your headphones to the splitter and the splitter to the source. Maybe a very slight loss in power from the source to the headphone, but that could easily have been my own ears. My testing wasn't exactly scientific. No difference in quality between outputs which makes me extremely happy. .
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Tkach

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean and compact item, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Widows 10 got you down? Has Microsoft stolen your subwoofer and no drivers will give it back? Well now there's hope. Just plug your sub and full range speakers in the female fittings. Then place the male plug into your soudcard's full range output. This only works if your subwoofer has it's own crossover though. Pro: Small plugs fit the confined spaces of PC input/output panels. Con: It feels a bit ... delicate. Definitely wear your kid gloves when handling this.
customer_reviews.author: 4estGimp

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I got this to split the audio coming from a computer. One output is to a 6-foot RCA cable into a TV. The other output is to a 25-foot RCA cable into an audio receiver. Both destinations receive the audio in perfect quality and with no delay. The female ports on this cable are great. They're snug, to the point where you actually "click" the male end into the port. No way are these going to accidentally disconnect themselves. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cable. Well made, with gold plated connectors. We bought this for a simple way to use both the desktop speaker system. Or to use the built in speakers of the hp 27" curved monitor. My desktop was upgraded to Windows 10 but does not have a HDMI output for sound. We had to use a dvi to HDMI converter cable for the monitor. For some reason there is no way for the monitor to read and play the audio, with that type of connection. This solved the problem. Works great with no change in the audio quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: bkeaAZ247!

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2016 and didn't use it until 2018. First time I used it, it didn't work. When I plugged my earbuds into one cable, it only produced sound in 1 ear, when I switched cables it only produced sound in the other ear. Not only did it not work correctly but the sound was crackly and popping and painful to listen to. 0/10 would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about a month, then one of the cables stopped working altogether. I’ve bought cheaper splitters in the past that also failed. Was really hoping that this one would be more durable since it was a bit more expensive than the previously purchased splitters. Unfortunately, it failed after a month of occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: mrmario

customer_reviews.title: Two people can listen at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter goes to online school and she is in kindergarten, so I needed to hear what was being said during live webcam sessions but she has to wear headphones so the teacher and other kids do not hear themselves when the microphones are being used. I bought this and was able to plug her headphones in and my headphones into one headphone jack on the laptop and it worked perfectly and the sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: ksallcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking and certainly does as advertised. My only complaint is the ends tend to loosen so you have to screw them back again - they are like shoe laces that just refuse to stay tight. I suspect this contributes to some feedback I'm getting when using Lepy mini-amps. I use these to connect Apple Airport Express's to Lepy Amps for home audio use.
customer_reviews.author: gnomehole

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cables.. Wires are a bit thin
customer_reviews.text: I needed Y-Splitters in order to plug both my Razer 7.1 headset and my desktop speakers in tot he same ports.. The plugs on these splitters are excellent, but the wires are a bit thinner than I would like... I have no problems with them and the sound quality is eeeeeeeeeeeexcellent...
customer_reviews.author: Aurihazuma

customer_reviews.title: Sharing device with 2 headphones
customer_reviews.text: Planning to travel and want to be able to share viewing downloaded movies. I tested it with 2 head sets attached. Connected each headphone to the connector and connector to iPhone. Initially just pushed the headphone jack into connector. Had to adjust (pull connector in / out) headset connection to Y adapter to get proper connection.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting an electronics item like this for ages. I don't use speakers all that often (at time of this review I have none), and my laptop's speakers aren't exactly great because it's just a laptop. Also a really handy item when it comes to travelling and sharing music. As for the product itself, I have to say I like its quality a lot. It's nice in that it is gold-plated and not nickel-plated (gold is superior to nickel in that it is less likely to wear off compared to nickel), and the connector casings are obviously not only aesthetically pleasing, but are solid and sturdy with their metal construction.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed - Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I plug it in my Roku remote so my hubby and I don’t disturb anyone else when streaming movies/TV shows at night. The Belkin I purchased before this one sounded horrible so I was leery of purchasing another one. However, I was blown away that the sound was so clear on both ends for the price. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few extra dollars and get this splitter. It will save you money.
customer_reviews.text: The connections click solid and before you even listen you know you have made an excellent purchase. Highly recommend over a cheapy cable. I wish I would have bought this in the first place. A cheap cable and or a cheap y cable will offer you many hours of wondering what the issue is with your headphones. Quality is worth the extra few dollars in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Strings

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as you fiddle now and then
customer_reviews.text: The material seems very flimsy and it seems to function in the same manner. I use this to get sound from my mixer headphones jack to both my headphones and speakers. I often had to twist or otherwise fiddle with the Y jacks because the sound would not work properly. It happened more often in the first few days but seems to work better now, perhaps I finally found the right angle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: destroyed my speakers
customer_reviews.text: got this to split my PC audio between 2 sets of speakers. when i played the first tune, the sound was filled with static. so I figured it just wasn't up to the task. but, when i went back to a single set of speakers, it was trashed. so i tried the other set. also trashed. live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: john mercer

customer_reviews.title: First audio splitter I have found that works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is the first audio splitter that I have felt works well. Not only does it have a small enough form factor so I can use it with my phone case it also works well with my apple headphones. There is no "sweet spot" I have to make sure I match they just work. I sometimes use this in conjunction withso that the audio is boosted.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Kierum

customer_reviews.title: Great construction and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Does not allow pass-thru of Apple approved headphones for the purpose of clicking to pause | rewind | fast-forward. I was hoping this Y-cord would allow me to have some Apple approved headphones for control, to exist along with a small portable speaker for listening. Probably NOT the Ugreen Y-cord's fault. It's probably the "nature of the beast" in that a Y-cord defeats the clicking/button/features of any Apple approved product to control your iPod / iPhone, etc. Nice quality build, with good rubber grommets at all connections. Highly recommended as a decent Y-cord only.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Meagher

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased to use with a laptop on an airplane and it worked perfectly. Now I use it in between a set of headphones and speakers for a desktop computer and it works without issue. The line and braiding feels a little thin but it is held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hun Gopher

customer_reviews.title: The Quality is Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bough this to split my earbuds with an in-line microphone to both the headphone and microphone jack on my desktop. This splitter works perfectly and has a good build quality too. The labels on each split end indicating which jack is for the microphone and which one is for the headphones is a nice touch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Small item, big value!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. It works as advertised. I needed to split a signal between 2 amps and my Apple Airport Base station. I now have whole house audio, master bedroom and bath, living room, dining room, and kitchen. This splitter may be small in size, but large in what it delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Fred D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, well made adapter.
customer_reviews.text: UGREEN Headphone Splitter, 3.5mm Audio Stereo Y Splitter Extension Cable Male to Female Dual Headpho PROS: Nice, sturdy, well made adapter. No distortion or drop in signal. Use it with my iPad to watch movies. CONS: None.
customer_reviews.author: ema

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, and is exactly as described. I'm using it to split the audio out from my Echo Dot to some small computer speakers (concealed in my entertainment console) and to my receiver, so that when the receiver is on another channel (watching TV or whatever), I can still hear the Echo Dot. (When I want to listen to music in higher quality, I just switch the receiver over to the Dot's channel. This is a hacky solution, but not at all the fault of this splitter cable--this little cable, plus some cheap computer speakers, is a super cheap solution to an annoying problem.)
customer_reviews.author: A. Sharer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say except that it works great. I'm using it to split sound output from a laptop dock to speakers on my monitor and as an input to my home theater system so that I can pipe the output of the computer throughout the house if I want. There is no hissing, crackling, or humming noise introduced into the audio output from using this, so I'm a happy camper. This splitter seems to be built from better quality materials that most of the ones I've bought in the past, especially at this price. I don't think you can go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent and it doesn't even sound like you're using a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The quality is excellent and it doesn't even sound like you're using a splitter. Not only is the quality great, but the product is made from metal and of course the wiring is rubberized, which makes it feel like it could withstand a drop if it occurred. I bought this so my girlfriend and I could watch movies on the plane together off my Ipad without having to do the whole share one headphone thing and it works really well. Haven't had any issues with it. Much better than the cheap $1 splitters. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: EvD

customer_reviews.title: Bad unit worked momentarily
customer_reviews.text: This unit did not stand up to any amount of axial line pressure, it was broken quite quickly Under what I would consider normal and or base usage,if it can't hold up to a slight off angle tug then what's the purpose of having it be in a flexible format?
customer_reviews.author: Racer X Maine

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described! Sure helps my twins from fighting over who gets to watch Netflix on their tablet! We took this with us to a couple of dance competitions this year as the wait for awards can be long. One girl was sad because her mom forgot to bring her tablet, but she had her headphones. She was overjoyed when my daughter had the splitter so they both could enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny May Shannon

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Needed a splitter because occasionally my girlfriend wants to listen in on when I am gaming with friends. She plugs in a set of ear buds or ear phones on the other pair and it works great. I was originally worried that the stereo sound wouldn't be preserved but nope. You still hear left and right... which is all we need.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with cable splitter
customer_reviews.text: I just got this cable splitter. I tested out both ends with a headset and it works just fine. Sound was clear. Jacks fit nice and snug. If I have any problems with use I will update this review but so far I am happy with the quality of this product at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, it actually lasts months so far.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and holds up well. I bought 2 of these thinking they would break like most very quickly, but I am surprised I only have used the one. It works well with my iPad and laptop to share sound when watching movies and listening to music with friends. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: KvnL

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter for headphones or any device!
customer_reviews.text: Great cable with no degradation from audio when splitting to two audio outputs. I am actually going to buy another when we get ready to travel again so we can listen to movies and music together. I currently have it on my PC splitting my headphones and speakers so I do not have to keep unplugging and plugging in my headset/speakers. Great audio splitter overall and I have not noticed any loss in sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: defiance5050

customer_reviews.title: Splits Audio from Electric Drum Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is connected to the output jack of a set of electric drum kit to both a headset and a speaker. This way I can monitor the drum beats through both, or one or the other. Both headset and speaker had fair to good audio quality. Pleased with purchase and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Typhoon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Got it on the actual delivery date. So far the test is on my HP Laptop and works well with 3 different headphones. The clarity is not affected in any way and works well. The headphones are going to be the only thing that can screw this up so far from what I see. The cables are made very well and haven't had any issues in the one week that I've had them. The connections are very tight and I don't think there will be a connection problem. I will be going to on a trip to Germany in 3 weeks and will be using these all the time during our trip and flight.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these so my 5 and 7 year old could share their iPad while on a European vacation that included planes, trains and car rides. It worked perfectly and we ended up also using it on the plane to watch onboard entertainment. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Peacher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality splitter
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems with my motherboards sound card not putting out sound to my gaming headset and the external speaker so i used this to bridge that gap. I do not notice any qaulity loss although i am only gaming in stereo and not surround. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dilks

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: We tried other splitters and they, for lack of a better term, sucked. Amazon was, as always, great enough to refund those purchases. But this splitter is PERFECT. There is no discernible difference in sound from just listening with my one set of headphones. It's amazing. We live in a condo so when we want to listen to music we feel bad turning it up too much- so we'd been looking for a good splitter. This is the one.
customer_reviews.author: SumBumbleBee

customer_reviews.title: Useful with some downsides
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality does suffer when using two earphones rather than one and when using this rather than the jack directly. The metal housing feel like it scratches easily but otherwise the exterior feels fairly premium. The female plugs make for a scratchy, bumpy and tight insertion but the socket clicks in sturdy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Easy enough for 5th graders to use.
customer_reviews.text: Used this splitter in my Macbook for student use to create a listening center. Two 5th grade students were able to listen/follow along to a read aloud at their reading level. Great alternative to expensive splitters/listening centers marketed to teachers. My students were able to figure out how to use it all by themselves and I never heard any complaint regarding the function. Worked well and I'm sure it will continue to work next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, no worries.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and keeps the cables attached snugly. Using this to connect 4 speakers (two on each line) to my sub, and they work great. When you plug the cables into the female connectors there is a nice audible click and I have no concerns about my cables falling out or having connection issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alamist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I use this splitter mainly to watch Netflix with my husband on the plane off my iPad. I purchased a different splitter on Amazon and those never worked...only one of the connection worked. These worked right out of the package and were much smaller than my old ones. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good product but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this product lower as the first headphone splitter I got was defective. I was disappointed at first, but I thought, "maybe it was a mishap", and emailed the customer representative instead. The representative replied promptly and had kept in contact all through the rest of the night in trying to help me and was able to get me a replacement quickly. Upon receiving the second product, it worked as it should with no problems whatsoever. To the representative who helped me, thank you so much and I appreciate the time and patience you put in towards helping me.
customer_reviews.author: LaLluviadePlata

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good value
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Speaker and headphone plugs click into the jacks securely. Sound quality is fine. Stereo separation is preserved. Just what I needed, no more switching between speakers and headphones. Price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: sierraseven

customer_reviews.title: I really like the splitters physical appearance and the weight of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially left a review indicating that sound only played in one earbud when plugged into the splitter. Now it plays in both ears - perhaps I just didn't have it plugged in all the way. I really appreciated the prompt response my review generated from the seller though! Unless I update this review again, you can assume the splitter is working just as it should - with sound coming through to both ears! Also, I really like the splitters physical appearance and the weight of the connecting bits. Nice and clean design.
customer_reviews.author: Jojanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for sharing audio
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on a recent American Airlines flight to Hawaii where your only entertainment option was accessing their system from a tablet. I was able to share the audio on my iPad with my travel mate so we could watch movies together. Sound quality was good, didn’t notice any drop off in quality or sound level with two sets of earbuds plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Holly AW

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just a note that this splitter can only send one kind of signal at a time. For example, if you use it for audio, you can only get audio from both splits. You cannot simultaneously use it for audio and microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Sound come through only one ear on both plug. I must have been a unlucky one to receive defected item, since so many of you love it... Up to you to try it. If you get it via prime you have no problem returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Snowyblack

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using almost daily for the past few months and no issue. The product has a great weight and the finishing on the connections points look solid. Seems super sturdy although it's just been plugged in and not really moved since I started using it. 5/5 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cable for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I got this splitter so my daughters could listen to the same music on a single cell phone while in the car via wired headphones. They tell me it works good. That is no music to my ears! Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item bent 2 weeks in
customer_reviews.text: Item bent 2 weeks in (at piece that plugs into laptop). Otherwise, serves its purpose but had to replace 2 weeks in. Hopefully it was just a lemon. Will update if the replacement I purchased bends also.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient adapter for sharing audio!
customer_reviews.text: I bought his connector to share audio out of phones and computers with my wife for when we are traveling, and it was definitely worth it. This allowed us to each have our own headphones and listen to the same video source. I'm pretty picky and didn't notice any degrading of the audio quality or anything like that. As long as I don't lose it it seems durable enough that I'll have it for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kellen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a trip. It allowed my husband and I to both be able to watch a movie together without disturbing the other passengers. Sound quality was not lessened by the split, nor was the volume. Very pleased with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these for a flight to London on WOW Air ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a flight to London on WOW Air (no TV screens, so brought the iPad to watch shows with my husband). Worked just as we needed for the long hauls! I tried to use this on my phone, which has a Lifeproof case on it, and it doesn't fit due to the case, so just FYI if you need to use this splitter cable with a Lifeproof case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for watching movies on a plane a couple times. However, you sometimes need to unplug and replug the headphones in to get it to work or twist the port around. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I’m pleased
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t noticed any signal loss, I don’t use it in any demanding scenarios so I do not know how it will perform otherwise. Judging the images before I bought it, I thought the wire would be a thicker gauge hence giving it a sturdier look, (it looks sturdy in the images to me) but I’m satisfied nonetheless even if it looks and feels a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: ggrRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Fantatsic Splitter
customer_reviews.text: This splitter works perfectly, we took it on the flight to argentina to split the audio to two headphones. The sound quality was loud and worked perfectly in our headphones, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphone splitter
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphone splitter. 10 year old son was lobbying for his own phone because his seat-mate on the bus has one and was always watching YouTube on the ride home leaving my son with nothing to do. Bought him this as a defense to the phone argument. It hasn't stopped the argument for a phone but provided a counter to his #1 case for getting his own phone.
customer_reviews.author: ATL Native

customer_reviews.title: Splits audio
customer_reviews.text: These split the audio so left comes out one side and right the other port. They do not work at all for what I needed them for
customer_reviews.author: LJ the juice man

customer_reviews.title: Headphone splitters
customer_reviews.text: Instead of spending a lot of money to create a surround-sound for TV and radio, this is a much cheaper approach. I use extension cord to create a surround-sound. It works if you don't mind putting up with cords.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good splitter
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a road trip last year so the kids could watch a portable DVD player. Somehow they lost it after a couple of trips. Just reordered, great splitter. Worked again for another road trip last weekend and no bickering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer rt

customer_reviews.title: Bought so my Fiance and I couldwatch movies on a tablet together while traveling
customer_reviews.text: Bought so my Fiance and I could watch movies on a tablet together while traveling. Everything seems well built, it's holding together well so far. I really like how "tight" everything snaps together so I don't have to worry about plugs falling out. I haven't noticed a drop in quality or volume while using it. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Four thumbs up..because two people.. :D
customer_reviews.text: Well we all know we can go to the dollar store to buy these now, but I was hoping for a better quality so I purchased this fella. Welllll worth it, the sound and quality is more clear than expected. Great for our airplane ride out of the country!
customer_reviews.author: N8

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Got this so my wife and I could watch movies together on my laptop for a long flight and this was exactly what I was looking for. Both of us could easily hear the movie on each of our headphones. Easy to use. This holds firm in the headphone port of my laptop and each headphone stayed plugged in to each of the two ports. Great price great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It fits JBL headphones snuggly as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my husband's new portable DVD Blu-ray player with JBL headphones. Others didn't fit the JBL hole. Have to use DVD sound control though not use JBL headphones for this.
customer_reviews.author: old woman In a shoe

product_meta.title: UGREEN Headphone Splitter, 3.5mm Audio Stereo Y Splitter Extension Cable Male to Female Dual Headphone Jack Adapter for Earphone, Headset Compatible with iPhone, Samsung, Tablet, Laptop (Black)
feature_bullets: Audio Sharing: Ugreen 3.5mm audio splitter allows dual headphones/speakers connected to most devices with 3.5mm auxiliary port (AUX), like MP3 player, smartphone, tablet, computer etc, which is a great solution to share cool music, movies and games with your families and friends.

Quality Sound: Polished 24K Gold-plated connector, aluminum shell, oxygen-free copper wire ensures higher audio transmission without signal loss and noise. Bring you superior stereo sound in both outputs.

Premium Materials: Durable shielding with pure copper, aluminum housing, Gold-plated plugs significantly enhances the durability for a longer lifespan. The strain-relief rings of the connector makes the it more stable and flexible.

Widely Usage: Work with most devices with 3.5mm auxiliary port (AUX), such as iPad, iPhone, iPods, MP3 players, Laptops, PCs, Cell Phones, Tablets, PlayStation, WII. The cable length is 20cm/8inch, whitch is compact and lightweight for your road trips and plane rides.

What You Get: 1x UGREEN 3.5mm Audio Splitter Cable. Important Notes: If you use TRRS headphones (4-conductor) with this extension cable, the audio will work but the Mic won't.It also does NOT work with the inline volume control on the headphone.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars7,683 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
